projects.title: Landing Page
projects.description: StarForge is a Modern UI/UX website, developed using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, exemplifies modern UI/UX principles. Its sleek design, seamless animations, and overall user experience set a high standard, serving as a reference or inspiration for future modern applications or websites in general

projects.title: Fitland
projects.description: Fitland is a responsive e-commerce app built with React and TypeScript, allowing users to browse, like, and purchase sports products with data stored locally for a fast, backend-free experience.
